message.content:
{"id": "18028", "title": "Bug 18028: Rename package doesn't check if all resources are writeable", "description": "When attempting to rename a package that contains a CU, the system does not check if all resources (including the CU) are writeable. This results in an unexpected exception dialog after completing the renaming process.", "OB": "1. Create a package with a CU in it
2. Make the CU readonly
3. Attempt to rename the package

Observed Behavior: After completing the renaming process, an unexpected exception dialog is displayed.", "EB": "The system should check if all resources, including the CU, are writeable before allowing a package to be renamed. If any resource is readonly, the renaming process should be aborted and an appropriate error message should be displayed.", "SR": "Implement a validation check during the renaming process to ensure that all resources, including the CU, are writeable. If any resource is readonly, display an error message and prevent the renaming process from being completed."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '18028', 'title': "Bug 18028Rename package doesn't check if all resources are writeable", 'description': "Bug 18028Rename package doesn't check if all resources are writeable ", 'OB': 'F1+ create a package with a CU in it make the CU readonly try to rename the package.observe: after finish you get an unexpected exception dialog. ', 'EB': '', 'SR': ''}
